t: Blessed*p is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful.
But*p his delight is in the law of the Lord;*s and in his law doth he meditate day and night.
And*p he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.
The*p ungodly are not so: but are like the chaff which the wind driveth away.
Therefore*p the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.
For*p the Lord*s knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
